title: Roast pork loin stuffed with mushrooms
ingredients: ['1kg boneless pork loin', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '3 cloves garlic, minced', 'salt and pepper, to taste', 'For the mushroom stuffing', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter', '1 onion, chopped', '300g mushrooms, chopped', '3 tablespoons dried breadcrumbs', '1 tablespoon grated cheese', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '100g smoked bacon rashers']
